The claim was made by Atiku Abubakar and: who filed a suit at the election tribunal stating that results from INEC's computer server showed that Atiku won the elections with 1.6 million votes.
Social media posts quoted Jega: the former INEC chairman, as saying that there is indeed an INEC server and that results were transmitted electronically during his time as chairman.
The Daily Independent newspaper ran an a: INEC Server Existed, Still Functional – Jega Insists", but the article quotes Jega as denying he made such a claim.
Jega himself confirmed via email that th: and that there was no server in INEC for the purpose of electronic transmission of results.
